version_description:
- Fixed Stories
- Added ability to view images and videos in messages
- Other bug fixes
- A bunch of cool stuff I forgot about
Fixes critical bugs than stop the user from being able to login on most occasions

- Smooths out the login experience
- Fixes crashes when attempting to login
- Fixes issue where stories crash when you are following tags
- Other minor improvements

- Fixed bug that crashes app when anything but the login button is tapped
- Fixed bug that caused messages to crash in some occasions
- Made it more obvious that you must tap "Log into Instagram"
- Automatically dismisses "Log in on your phone" alert

- Fixes bug where some users are having a hard time logging in
- Fixes bug where the app randomly logs out
- Fixes bug where feed and stories crash (hopefully)
- Adds loading wheel to login screen
- Fixes bug where the screen loads forever if there is no internet
- Fixes bug where logging out of the app takes forever
- Made it clear that you can use the device straight after you sign in and DO NOT HAVE TO BUY PRO
- Adds support button

- Fixes crash when opening the app after logging in
- Fixes bug where certain content appears twice
- Fixes bug with communication between the phone and watch
- Changed the way the not logged in interface is presented on the watch

- Fixes issue where following users logs you out
- Fixes unexpected logout issue
- Profiles load faster (media is loaded separately)

- More Complications
- Feed loads new posts automatically when scrolling down
- Added support for watchOS 4
- Added ability to zoom in on images
- Fixed issue where timeline doesn't load

- Fixed bug where you have to logout twice to switch to another account
- Fixed bug where timeline was not loading latest media
- Updated FlickType

- Fixed crash when viewing messages!
- Fixed videos!
- Videos now download before viewing
Fixes issue with requirements causing devices on watchOS 5 to reject the install of the app

- Fixed issue with iPhone app crashing when opening and stopping purchases from being restored
- Fixed watchOS 4 support

- Fixed bug that let you get Lens Pro for free: Pro users will have to reopen the iPhone app to restore Pro (Sorry for the inconvenience)
- New menu design
- Other minor bug fixes

- Added Star Apps
- Bug fixes

- Name change
- Bug fixes

- Fixes major bug that causes the iPhone app to crash or display a blank screen on opening.
- Another name change

- iPhone app redesign
- Tips
- Fixes restore purchases bug
- Connection between phone and watch is more reliable
- Other Bug fixes

- Fixes Stories
- Added other watch apps section

- You can now buy Lens Pro and Tip on the watch!
- You can now "Pay what you want" for Pro
- Fixes bug where search shows no results
- Other minor bug fixes

- Fixes Stories
- Other bug fixes
Bug fixes and minor improvements.
Major bug fix where app crashes when loading feed.
Fixes bug where some stories may crash when attempting to be open.
